channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins FitNesse Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins FitNesse Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2120|2024-08-04T07:01:40.804Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fitnesse%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins FitNesse Plugin 1.30 and earlier does not configure the XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-2175|2024-08-04T07:01:40.662Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fitnesse%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins FitNesse Plugin 1.31 and earlier does not correctly escape report contents before showing them on the Jenkins UI, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users able to control the XML input files processed by the plugin.
